overview: This video is from the Australian show Four Corners. It was filmed in late 1979 at the very first Chuck E. Cheese's Pizza Time Theatre on Winchester Blvd. in San Jose, California. It contains the only known footage from that original pilot store, and the only existing video of some of the earliest cyberamics and characters. It also features a sneak peek of Dolli Dimples from the second San Jose Pizza Time Theatre, located across town on Kooser Road.
title: Four Corners: New Eatery Fad
